so let's take a look at why you would want to utilize Cape Gateway what are
its benefits so the Cape gateway provides a great drop-in replacement for your physical

when the backup software exports or ejects the tape the tape kate remarks

so when the Storage Gateway is running on your premises and transferring data to the Storage Gateway service running

in cloud you have the ability to encrypt your data server-side using default keys
or you can utilize kms which means you can utilize your own keys for encrypting
the tapes and then with respect to performance the tape gateway offers a
local cache so the tape gateway resides on premises next to your backup
